name: Amayadoru
description:
[ 4days only! (3/11~3/14) ] ♥  LANGUAGES
  • 日本語 (Original, Not suitable for study)
  • English (MTL, Translated by DeepL and ty)
✖  WARNING
  • English translated by machine translation
  • Does not have a pronoun change tool
  • 12+ (sexual innuendo / strong language)
☂  STORY Suddenly we are caught in the rain. We have to take shelter from the rain for a while. Let's pass the time by talking! ☂  FEATURES
  • 3 Love, 6 Endings
  • All playtime : about 30 min
  • Voice act with synthetic voice (Japanese language voice only)
☂  CREDITS
  • Engine　Ren'Py
  • Voice　AI Text to Voice Free Software COEIROINK　COEIROINK:hakuti-
  • Image　ICOOON MONO　Unsplash
  • Music　くまのこ道 FilmCow FarBeyond Studio
  • Font Jikasei Font Studio　BIZ UD gothic
  • Script　Ren'Py documentation　Lemma Soft Forums　crAsm　akakyouryuu npckc Free Portrait mode GUI template Wattson Lezalith's Programming Cave
  • English Translation DeepL

* Please see the attached readme for details.

☂  OTHER

Q. Isn't the name of this game "Amayadoru tsukanoma no koto"?
A. I thought the name was too long and omitted it. You can call us by either name.

Play in browser
